channel.title: Avanti - Move Forward
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imm.io/G7eF.png[/img]
[B]Base[/B]
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/373801-last-me-project-insanity-evolved-v-3-a.html][PI] Project Insanity Evolved[/url]
[B]Development team[/B]
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/spear/]Spear[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/photon/]Photon[/url] [/CENTER]
[B][COLOR=Red]Client Information[/B]
We're using [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/306231-runelimited-client-thread-update-august-17-2011-a.html]Galkons RuneLimited Client[/url] client. The client is being heavily edited though. If you're looking for the 'Account Lobby' part of the client, that will not be released until either beta stage, or official release stage.
[COLOR=Red][B]Server Information[/B][/COLOR]
Yes, we're using Project Insanity. Why? We were thinking of starting with Hyperion, but due to school & not enough time, we decided to go with a Project Insanity base. The base is cleaned, and can hold over 500 actual players easily with no lag.
[COLOR=Red][B]Website Information[/B][/COLOR]
Even though we haven't released a website yet, we'll be using MyBB. Some things you can expect in our website is Highscores, Automatic Donations, Account Recovery, Live Support Chat (with ticket center), and more.
[COLOR=Red][B]Note:[/B][/COLOR] Most of the current features you see right now will all be released in closed Alpha testing. We know all of the skills/mini-games and all of that aren't in the features list. Thanks.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/hwd2qc.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Melee System[/COLOR][/B]
-[COLOR=Green]A near perfect melee maxhit and special max hit tested via RuneHQ[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Green]Poisoned weapons and poisioning to opponent.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Green]Correct special melee effects (Wretched Strength, Void melee increase)[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Green]Proper item requirements.[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ngv1qc.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Ranging System[/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=Orange]-Correct bolt specials(Dragon's breath, Leech life etc.) -Correct ammo to bows and crossbows. -Proper range timers (Need to test for perfection) -Correct range bonuses -Proper ranging max hit [/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/5cefzd.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Magic System[/COLOR][/B]
-[COLOR=Orange]Correct casting and freezing timers[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Orange]Nearly all modern spell's working.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Orange]All ancient spell's working[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Orange]All lunar spell's working[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Green]Autocasting for selected staffs[/COLOR]
[B][COLOR=Black][SIZE=3]**Skilling System**[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/fxb79u.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Woodcutting[/COLOR][/B] -[COLOR=Green]Support for near all trees and various locations.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Green]Stump support with tree respawning.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Green]Faster woodcutting as your level progresses.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Green]Bird nests dropping randomly.[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2dadj54.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Firemaking[/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=Green]-Ashes support -Fires last longer depending on log usage -Firelighter support (Need to finish white and purple)[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Green]Clipped firemaking[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2wnbql5.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Cooking[/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=Orange]-Near to all cooking every item that is cookable (Need to check some) -Able to Cook on Ranges, Stoves, Fires etc.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Orange]Making multi-stepped food (Pizza, Tuna potatoes, Pies)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/16a5vee.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Runecrafting[/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=Red]-All Crafting Altars operable -Abyssal Trench access[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Red]Talisman support(Maybe just use ZMI)[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Red]Proper Pouch usage without dupes[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2zhgqdz.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Agility[/COLOR][/B]
-[COLOR=Orange]-Working Wilderness, Gnome, Barbarian Courses[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Orange]Correct animations and timers[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Red]Must have a certain agility level to use shortcuts.[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/1z1y3wl.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Fishing[/COLOR][/B]
-[COLOR=Red]Many Fishing locations. (Fishing Guild, Karamja, Draynor, Catherby & More.)[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-Proper fishing spot requirements -All fishing equipment fully functional[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/10x63rt.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Mining[/COLOR][/B]
-[COLOR=Red]Able to mine Rune Essence via Aubury with dialogue.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Red]Access to the Mining Guild if you have the correct level.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Red]Correct mining on every rock.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Red]Prospecting[/color]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/20kf18m.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Herblore[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR=Green]-Create nearly all potions. -Cleaning Herbs support. -Herb identifying with level support. -Correct animations -Correct potion mixing.[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/20uq4i9.png[/img][B][COLOR=Black]Slayer[/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=Red]-Tasks and amount given depending on level. -Enchanted gem support with dialogues.[/COLOR] -[COLOR=Red]Slayer mask effect[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100607202123/runescape/images/5/5c/Minigame_icon.png[/img] [COLOR=Black][B]Minigames[/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]-Duel Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]-Barrows[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-Tzhaar Caves[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]-Nightmare Awakes[/COLOR][COLOR=red][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/archive/e/e1/20100205121459%21Music_icon.png[/img] [COLOR=Black][B]Music/Sounds[/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]Music plays in most regions[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-Weapon sounds[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-NPC sounds[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-Custom sounds/music (used for custom quests & mini-games)[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120131231040/runescape/images/0/05/Quest_icon.png[/img] [COLOR=Black][B]Quests[/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Tutorial Island[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-Rune Mysteries[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-Lost City[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-Lunar Diplomacy[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-Desert Treasure[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [COLOR=Black][B]Miscellaneous[/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Random Events[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]-Bankpin system[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]-Skilling Guilds[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]-Pickable items[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]-Transportation (boats, gnome glider, gnome trees, etc)[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]-Treasure Trails[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]-Poison on items[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]-Enchanting[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]-Run Draining (with restore based on Agility level)[/COLOR]
[size=3][b]Media[/b][/size]
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/5lscci.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/27wuijl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1z3bk1c.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wEs3o.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/q3JIV.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Videos[/b][/size]
Herblore
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SuAhLSQurvM[/youtube]
Support Signatures
[img]http://i.imm.io/G7eF.png[/img]
[url=http://i.imm.io/G7eF.png]http://i.imm.io/G7eF.png[/url]
Credits:
[*]Photon - Developer [*]Spear - Manager [*]Insanity - Original Project Insanity developer [*]Ambient - Base [*]Galkon - Client [*]RuneScape Wiki - Information

item.title: Avanti - Move Forward
item.dc:creator: @Spear_yes Spear_yes
item.description:
@Spear_yes wrote:

Thanks everyone.

Woodcutting is now completed, and Firemaking bugs have been fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Avanti - Move Forward
item.dc:creator: @Spear_yes Spear_yes
item.description:
@Spear_yes wrote:

[CENTER]

Base

[PI] Project Insanity Evolved

Development team

Spear
Photon
[/CENTER]

[COLOR=Red]Client Information

We’re using Galkons RuneLimited Client client. The client is being heavily edited though. If you’re looking for the ‘Account Lobby’ part of the client, that will not be released until either beta stage, or official release stage.

[COLOR=Red]Server Information[/COLOR]

Yes, we’re using Project Insanity. Why? We were thinking of starting with Hyperion, but due to school & not enough time, we decided to go with a Project Insanity base. The base is cleaned, and can hold over 500 actual players easily with no lag.

[COLOR=Red]Website Information[/COLOR]

Even though we haven’t released a website yet, we’ll be using MyBB. Some things you can expect in our website is Highscores, Automatic Donations, Account Recovery, Live Support Chat (with ticket center), and more.

[COLOR=Red]Note:[/COLOR] Most of the current features you see right now will all be released in closed Alpha testing. We know all of the skills/mini-games and all of that aren’t in the features list. Thanks.

[COLOR=Black]Melee System[/COLOR]

-[COLOR=Green]A near perfect melee maxhit and special max hit tested via RuneHQ[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Green]Poisoned weapons and poisioning to opponent.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Green]Correct special melee effects (Wretched Strength, Void melee increase)[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Green]Proper item requirements.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Ranging System[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Orange]-Correct bolt specials(Dragon’s breath, Leech life etc.)
-Correct ammo to bows and crossbows.
-Proper range timers (Need to test for perfection)
-Correct range bonuses
-Proper ranging max hit [/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Magic System[/COLOR]

-[COLOR=Orange]Correct casting and freezing timers[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Orange]Nearly all modern spell’s working.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Orange]All ancient spell’s working[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Orange]All lunar spell’s working[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Green]Autocasting for selected staffs[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black][SIZE=3]Skilling System[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Woodcutting[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Green]Support for near all trees and various locations.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Green]Stump support with tree respawning.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Green]Faster woodcutting as your level progresses.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Green]Bird nests dropping randomly.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Firemaking[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Green]-Ashes support
-Fires last longer depending on log usage
-Firelighter support (Need to finish white and purple)[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Green]Clipped firemaking[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Cooking[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Orange]-Near to all cooking every item that is cookable (Need to check some)
-Able to Cook on Ranges, Stoves, Fires etc.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Orange]Making multi-stepped food (Pizza, Tuna potatoes, Pies)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Runecrafting[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Red]-All Crafting Altars operable
-Abyssal Trench access[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Red]Talisman support(Maybe just use ZMI)[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Red]Proper Pouch usage without dupes[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Agility[/COLOR]

-[COLOR=Orange]-Working Wilderness, Gnome, Barbarian Courses[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Orange]Correct animations and timers[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Red]Must have a certain agility level to use shortcuts.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Fishing[/COLOR]

-[COLOR=Red]Many Fishing locations. (Fishing Guild, Karamja, Draynor, Catherby & More.)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-Proper fishing spot requirements
-All fishing equipment fully functional[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Mining[/COLOR]

-[COLOR=Red]Able to mine Rune Essence via Aubury with dialogue.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Red]Access to the Mining Guild if you have the correct level.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Red]Correct mining on every rock.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Red]Prospecting[/color]

[COLOR=Black]Herblore[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Green]-Create nearly all potions.
-Cleaning Herbs support.
-Herb identifying with level support.
-Correct animations
-Correct potion mixing.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Slayer[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Red]-Tasks and amount given depending on level.
-Enchanted gem support with dialogues.[/COLOR]
-[COLOR=Red]Slayer mask effect[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Minigames[/COLOR]

[COLOR=red]-Duel Arena[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Barrows[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-Tzhaar Caves[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]-Nightmare Awakes[/COLOR][COLOR=red][/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Music/Sounds[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Orange]Music plays in most regions[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-Weapon sounds[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-NPC sounds[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-Custom sounds/music (used for custom quests & mini-games)[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Quests[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Orange]-Tutorial Island[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-Rune Mysteries[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-Lost City[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-Lunar Diplomacy[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-Desert Treasure[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Black]Miscellaneous[/COLOR]

[COLOR=Orange]-Random Events[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Bankpin system[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Skilling Guilds[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Pickable items[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Transportation (boats, gnome glider, gnome trees, etc)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Treasure Trails[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Poison on items[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Red]-Enchanting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]-Run Draining (with restore based on Agility level)[/COLOR]
